content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. As a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains from this property. I would like to discuss the rental price with you further to ensure that both of us are satisfied with the agreement. What rental price do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Maria Mamani, thank you for coming. I am happy to hear that you are interested in the apartment. As a student, I am on a tight budget and I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. What is the rental price you have in mind?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price, Maria. As a landlord, I would like to ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I was thinking a rental price of €800 per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am open to negotiation, but I am not sure if I can afford that price. What is the minimum price you can accept?

I also want to make sure that I am getting a good deal. Can you tell me more about the apartment and its features?

I am also worried about the responsibilities that come with renting an apartment. As a student, I may not have the resources to handle maintenance issues and repairs. Can you tell me more about your expectations and responsibilities for tenants?

Lastly, I am looking for a long-term lease. Can you tell me more about your lease terms and agreements?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price, Maria. As a landlord, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to offer a rental price of €700 per month as a minimum. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses associated with renting the apartment.

As for the apartment and its features, it is a two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment located in the heart of New York City. It has hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows with city views. The apartment is also equipped with a modern kitchen and bathroom, as well as a washer and dryer.

In terms of responsibilities, as a landlord, I expect my tenants to maintain the property in good condition and to report any maintenance issues or repairs promptly. I also expect my tenants to pay rent on time and to abide by the terms of the lease agreement.

As for lease terms and agreements, I offer a one-year lease with the option to renew for an additional year. The lease agreement outlines the rental price, responsibilities, and other terms and conditions of the lease. It also includes a security deposit and a move-in fee.
name: Heinrich Heine
